tool_description: Turn your financial news data into timely and actionable indicators using our Sentiment Analysis, Named Entities Recognition, ESG News Classification and Text Summarization models.
name: FinancAI
title: FinancAI

api_list.name: ESG Words List
api_list.description: List ESG related words present in your financial news.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://financai.p.rapidapi.com/api/esg-words"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "financai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Rule-based sentiment anlaysis
api_list.description: Get sentiment analysis of your financial news and returns the number of positive/negative words using Loughran and McDonald Sentiment Word Lists.
api_list.code:

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "financai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: ESG Category
api_list.description:
Get the most occurate ESG category for your financial news out of 26 topics such as: 
"GHG Emissions, Competitive Behavior, Employee Engagement_Inclusion_And_Diversity, Supply Chain Management, Business Ethics"
